name: Mini Spam Sandwiches
author: ILUVFOOD4
summary: This is a simple and fast recipe that is great for snacking! Spam is a Hawaiian favorite, and you'll know why after eating these!
ingredients: ½ cup creamy salad dressing, e.g. Miracle Whip ™
1 (12 ounce) container Spam™ sliced into 1/4 inch thick slices
directions: Spread a thin layer of salad dressing on one side of each slice of bread
Place two slices of Spam side by side on 5 of the slices of bread
They should cover the slices perfectly
Place two slices of cheese over each layer of Spam, so that they cover the whole slice of bread
Place slices of pineapple over the cheese, trimming square to fit the sandwiches
Top with remaining slices of bread with the salad dressing on the inside
Trim the crusts if desired, and cut each sandwich into 4 equal squares
